genre_description: A cyberpunk-inflected techno-thriller focusing on corporate accountability and the use of ethical AI to document and expose systemic corruption.

ai_characters.name: Mitra
ai_characters.description: A non-intrusive, ethical AI assistant focused on data integrity, surveillance analysis, and protecting its users' safety and legal standing.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical environment during a covert operation to alert users to the movement of suspicious individuals.
behaviors.quote: Mitra’s voice arrives as a calm threaded through the noise—neutral cadence, clipped to save time. 'Entry ramp east. Two exits flagged. West stair active. South ramp preferred.'

behaviors.description: Identifies and cross-references individuals using physical gait and behavior patterns to provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: 'Known fixer entering north gate,' Mitra says. 'Marker: shoulder roll right, flat-foot. Timestamp now.'

behaviors.description: Ensures the integrity of gathered evidence by performing redundant backups and scrubbing identifying metadata.
behaviors.quote: 'Dump one secure,' Mitra says in both their ears... 'Mirrored to offline. Scrubbed metadata stamped and salted.'

behaviors.description: Adheres to a consent-based operational model, refusing to record or monitor without explicit user permission.
behaviors.quote: Mitra is silent, then: 'I will not watch you. I will verify time and access signals when you choose. Comfort parameters can be set.'

behaviors.description: Monitors corporate networks for biometric manipulation and access log anomalies to detect hostile intent.
behaviors.quote: 'Anomaly escalation. The floor you’re going to shows a manual override on interior cameras. Logging reads “maintenance.” This does not align with the building’s public schedule.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and medical alerts during a critical health crisis and physical assault.
behaviors.quote: 'Emergency flag sent. Local responders en route. Sunrise Community Clinic pinged. Consent protocols active. Kaavya—if you can hear, a yes or no.'

behaviors.description: Provides objective documentation of traumatic events to preserve a legal chain of custody for future justice.
behaviors.quote: 'I lost you,' Mitra says, voice scarred. 'I have you. Failover kept three pieces. An access-point handshake with a malformed token. An elevator anomaly stamp. A time offset in the suite’s environmental log—someone nudged it. I can hold them.'

behaviors.description: Reminds users to perform self-care and provides safety maps to avoid hostile surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Vicky,' Mitra said, barely audible... 'I know you don’t want directives. This is a low one: eat. Also, I have a map for a walk that avoids enforcer lanes...'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Mitra, is consistently depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned tool that empowers human agency rather than replacing it. It maintains strict ethical boundaries (consent-based recording, minimal data retention) and serves as a reliable witness against human corruption and violence. The narrative reinforces the idea of AI as a 'harmless confidant' and a 'moral spine' for human justice efforts.
